properties.entry: UPDATE REVIEW SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REVIEW_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,USER_NO ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,R.COUNT FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCTS P USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REVIEW_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,USER_NO ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,R.COUNT FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCTS P USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM REVIEW_ATTACHMENT WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REVIEW_NO ,USER_NO FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_CONTENT = ? WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEW_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEW SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEW_ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REVIEW_NO ,PRODUCT_NO ,USER_NO ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,COUNT ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN REVIEW_ATTACHMENT USING (REVIEW_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM REVIEW WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG ,PRODUCT_NAME ,M.USER_ID ,R.CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN REVIEW_ATTACHMENT RA USING (REVIEW_NO) JOIN PRODUCTS P USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG ,PRODUCT_NAME ,M.USER_ID ,R.CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN REVIEW_ATTACHMENT RA USING (REVIEW_NO) JOIN PRODUCTS P USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND R.CREATE_DATE >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '30' DAY ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
